premiumServices.name: Rare Vintage & Premium Tier Alcohol
premiumServices.description: Exclusive, ultra high-end alcohol bottle delivery service with custom bottle engraving. Savor the finest spirits, each bottle custom engraved with a name or message of your choice.

premiumServices.name: Luxury Transportation Options
premiumServices.description: Arrive in style with luxury transportation options. Choose from high-end vehicles, luxury sedans, or limo buses to transport you and your guests to and from the yacht.

premiumServices.name: Chef Services for Onboard Dining
premiumServices.description: Transform your yacht charter into a gourmet journey. Elite chefs craft exquisite, custom menus tailored to your preferences and dietary needs.

premiumServices.name: Bespoke Catering Delivery
premiumServices.description: Gourmet dishes from Miami's top restaurants, delivered fresh and ready to delight your palate. Each bite is a testament to culinary artistry.

premiumServices.name: High-End Sushi Delivery
premiumServices.description: Meticulously crafted rolls and sashimi, made from the freshest ingredients and delivered directly to your yacht. The art of Japanese cuisine on the open sea.

premiumServices.name: Onboard Masseuse
premiumServices.description: Professional onboard masseuse service designed to melt away your stresses. Bespoke massage treatments tailored to your needs while you drift across Miami's tropical waters.

premiumServices.name: Drone Video Pilot Services
premiumServices.description: Professional drone video pilot services capture stunning aerial footage of your yacht surrounded by Miami's iconic skyline and pristine waters.
